weeklyMealPlanning.title: Plan the week?
weeklyMealPlanning.description: Good time to organize your meals with what you have at home.
weeklyMealPlanning.prompt: Plan my meals for this week using only what I already have in the pantry.

cookBeforeExpiry.title: You have items expiring soon
cookBeforeExpiry.description: I'll suggest recipes to use them before they go bad.
cookBeforeExpiry.prompt: Suggest recipes that prioritize the products expiring soon in my pantry.

smartCookingIdeas.title: What should I cook today?
smartCookingIdeas.description: I'll give you ideas with what you have in your pantry right now.
smartCookingIdeas.prompt: Give me cooking ideas using the ingredients I have available.

planAndSaveTime.title: Plan the week with AI
planAndSaveTime.description: With PRO, organize your weekly menu and save time every day.

historyUnlimited.title: What do you waste most?
historyUnlimited.description: With PRO, discover what you throw away and buy only what you need.

smartInsights.title: Alerts before expiry
smartInsights.description: With PRO, I'll tell you what to cook so you don't waste anything.

pantryHealthy.title: Your pantry is in great shape
pantryHealthy.description: Everything's under control. A good time to plan your next shopping list.

addExpiryDates.title: Add expiry dates to your items
addExpiryDates.description: Track what to use first and avoid unpleasant surprises in your pantry.

lowStockReminder.title: Some items are running low
lowStockReminder.description: Add them to your shopping list so you don't run out.

organizeWithCategories.title: Organize your pantry by category
organizeWithCategories.description: Group your products to find them faster and keep everything under control.

agent.title: Planning
agent.placeholder: Ask for recipes, meal plans, or ways to use what you have.

preview.title: PRO Planner
preview.headline: Recipes and meal plans from what's in your pantry
preview.subtitle: Get recipes, menus, and insights tailored to your pantry.

demo.userMessage: ‚ÄúUse what expires this week to plan dinners.‚Äù
demo.agentMessage: Great idea. You have spinach and feta that expire in 2 days. How about a spinach pesto pasta tonight and a Greek-style omelette tomorrow?

quickStart.title: Contextual entry
quickStart.headline: Start with something specific
quickStart.subtitle: Tap an option and the planner gets going on its own.
quickStart.todayPrompt: What can I cook today with what I have at home? Give me a few ideas.
quickStart.weeklyPlanPrompt: Put together a weekly menu for me ‚Äî 7 days, breakfast, lunch and dinner ‚Äî using what's in my pantry.
quickStart.useExpiringPrompt: I have things about to expire. What should I cook so they don't go to waste?
quickStart.surpriseMePrompt: Pick a recipe I can make with what I have and surprise me. Just one.

messages.unifiedError: The meal planner couldn't reply right now. Please try again in a few seconds.

errors.coldStart: The service is starting up. Please try again in a few seconds.

errors.offline: No internet connection. Please connect and try again.

agent.disclaimer: Recipes and meal plans are generated by AI and may contain errors.

ai.contextPlaceholder: E.g.: Family of 3, no nuts, Mediterranean cuisine.

reset.confirm:
This will delete all data saved on this device.
Do you want to continue?

export.unavailable: Export is not available in this environment.

import.confirm: This will replace your current data with the selected file. Continue?
